statements: SELECT * FROM ProductionBatches WHERE batch_id = 100
SELECT product_name, lot_number FROM ProductionBatches WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31'
SELECT manufacturing_date, expiration_date FROM ProductionBatches WHERE product_name = 'Widget'
SELECT * FROM ProductionBatches ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC
SELECT batch_id, product_name, expiration_date FROM ProductionBatches WHERE lot_number LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM ProductionBatches WHERE manufacturing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, lot_number FROM ProductionBatches WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ProductionBatches WHERE expiration_date < manufacturing_date;
SELECT product_name, manufacturing_date, expiration_date FROM ProductionBatches WHERE lot_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_name, lot_number FROM ProductionBatches ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC, expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_batches;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM production_batches WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM batch_tracking WHERE quality_issue IS NOT NULL;
SELECT lot_number, production_date FROM production_batches ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT tracking_id, batch_id, quality_issue FROM batch_tracking ORDER BY tracking_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_batches WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, lot_number FROM production_batches ORDER BY product_name ASC, lot_number DESC;
SELECT b.product_name, bt.tracking_id FROM production_batches b INNER JOIN batch_tracking bt ON b.batch_id = bt.batch_id WHERE bt.recall_date IS NOT NULL;

SELECT b.product_name AS product, COUNT(bt.tracking_id) AS total_tracking FROM production_batches b LEFT JOIN batch_tracking bt ON b.batch_id = bt.batch_id GROUP BY b.product_name HAVING COUNT(bt.tracking_id) > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM production_batches WHERE lot_number LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT * FROM production_batches;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM production_batches ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT lot_number FROM production_batches WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
SELECT recall_reason, recall_date FROM recalls WHERE recall_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT lot_number, expiration_date FROM lot_numbers WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM production_batches WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM production_batches WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT batch_id, product_name, production_date FROM production_batches ORDER BY production_date DESC;

SELECT p.batch_id, p.product_name, l.lot_number, r.recall_reason FROM production_batches p LEFT JOIN recalls r ON p.batch_id = r.batch_id LEFT JOIN lot_numbers l ON p.batch_id = l.batch_id WHERE r.recall_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT MAX(lot_number) AS max_lot_number FROM lot_numbers;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT id, product_name, description FROM products WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Pharmaceuticals';
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM pharmacies ORDER BY pharmacy_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM recalls WHERE recall_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, batch_number, production_date, quantity FROM production_batches WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_batches WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, expiry_date FROM products WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Pharmaceuticals';
SELECT pb.batch_number, pb.production_date, p.product_name FROM production_batches pb JOIN products p ON pb.product_id = p.id;

SELECT r.reason, r.recall_date, pb.batch_number, p.product_name FROM recalls r JOIN production_batches pb ON r.batch_id = pb.id JOIN products p ON pb.product_id = p.id WHERE r.recall_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT ph.pharmacy_name, ph.location, COALESCE(ph.contact_number, 'Not available') AS phone_number FROM pharmacies ph;
SELECT * FROM production_batches;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM production_batches ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, role FROM employees WHERE department='Production';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, dosage FROM product_details WHERE product_id=1;
SELECT * FROM recalls WHERE reason='Product expired' ORDER BY recall_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_batches;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM production_batches WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM product_details WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Pharmaceuticals';
SELECT issue_description, reported_date, batch_id FROM quality_issues ORDER BY reported_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, role, department FROM employees WHERE role IN ('Manager', 'Supervisor') ORDER BY employee_name;
